Title: Belle de Jour
Writer: Joseph Kessel (novel), Luis Buñuel (adaptation), Jean-Claude Carrière (adaptation)
Actors: Catherine Deneuve, Jean Sorel, Michel Piccoli, Geneviève Page
Plot: A frigid young housewife decides to spend her midweek afternoons as a prostitute.
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 6 wins & 6 nominations.
